ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: We sent Noah to his People (with the Command): "Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty."
ayas.transliteration: innā arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi an andhir qawmaka min qabli an ya-tiyahum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:
ayas.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayas.translation: "That ye should worship Allah, fear Him and obey me:
ayas.transliteration: ani'-budullāha wattaqūhu wa-aṭī`ūn

ayas.arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: "So He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a stated Term: for when the Term given by Allah is accomplished, it cannot be put forward: if ye only knew."
ayas.transliteration: yaghfir lakum min dhunūbikum wayu-akhhirkum ilā ajalin musammā ۚ inna ajalallāhi idhā jā-a lā yu-akhhar ۖ law kuntum ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
ayas.translation: He said: "O my Lord! I have called to my People night and day:
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī da`awtu qawmī laylan wanahārā

ayas.arabic: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
ayas.translation: "But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
ayas.transliteration: falam yazid-hum du`ā-ī illā firārā

ayas.arabic: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
ayas.translation: "And every time I have called to them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, grown obstinate, and given themselves up to arrogance.
ayas.transliteration: wa innī kullamā da`awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja`alū aṣābi`ahum fī ādhānihim wastaghshaw thiyābahum wa-aṣarrū wastakbarus-tikbārā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
ayas.translation: "So I have called to them aloud;
ayas.transliteration: thumma innī da`awtuhum jihārā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
ayas.translation: "Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
ayas.transliteration: thumma innī a`lantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum isrārā

ayas.arabic: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
ayas.translation: "Saying, 'Ask forgiveness from your Lord; for He is Oft-Forgiving;
ayas.transliteration: faqultus taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffārā

ayas.arabic: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
ayas.translation: "'He will send rain to you in abundance;
ayas.transliteration: yursilis samā-a `alaykum midrārā

ayas.arabic: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
ayas.translation: "'Give you increase in wealth and sons; and bestow on you gardens and bestow on you rivers (of flowing water).
ayas.transliteration: wayumdidkum bi-amwālin wabanīna wayaj`al lakum jannātin wayaj`al lakum anhārā

ayas.arabic: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
ayas.translation: "'What is the matter with you, that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in Allah,-
ayas.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillāhi waqārā

ayas.arabic: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
ayas.translation: "'Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
ayas.transliteration: waqad khalaqakum aṭwārā

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
ayas.translation: "'See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
ayas.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqallāhu sab`a samāwātin ṭibāqā

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
ayas.translation: "'And made the moon a light in their midst, and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp?
ayas.transliteration: waja`alal-qamara fīhinna nūran waja`alash shamsa sirājā

ayas.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
ayas.translation: "'And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),
ayas.transliteration: wallāhu anbatakum minal-arḍi nabātā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
ayas.translation: "'And in the End He will return you into the (earth), and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)?
ayas.transliteration: thumma yu`īdukum fīhā wayukhrijukum ikhrājā

ayas.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
ayas.translation: "'And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),
ayas.transliteration: wallāhu ja`ala lakumul-arḍa bisāṭā

ayas.arabic: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
ayas.translation: "'That ye may go about therein, in spacious roads.'"
ayas.transliteration: litaslukū minhā subulan fijājā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
ayas.translation: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.
ayas.transliteration: qāla nūḥun rabbi innahum `aṣawnī wattaba`ū man lam yazid-hu māluhu wawaladuhu illā khasārā

ayas.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
ayas.translation: "And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
ayas.transliteration: wa makarū makran kubbārā

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
ayas.translation: "And they have said (to each other), 'Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa', neither Yaguth nor Ya'uq, nor Nasr';-
ayas.transliteration: waqālū lā tadharunna ālihatakum walā tadharunna waddan walā suwā`an walā yaghūtha waya`ūqa wanasrā

ayas.arabic: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
ayas.translation: "They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark)."
ayas.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīrā ۖ walā tazidiẓ ẓālimīna illā ḍalālā

ayas.arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
ayas.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood), and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of Allah- none to help them.
ayas.transliteration: mimmā khaṭī-ātihim ughriqū fa-udkhilū nāran falam yajidū lahum min dūnillāhi anṣārā

ayas.arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
ayas.translation: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
ayas.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar `alal-arḍi minal kāfirīna dayyārā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
ayas.translation: "For, if Thou dost leave (any of) them, they will but mislead Thy devotees, and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.
ayas.transliteration: innaka in tadharhum yuḍillū `ibādaka walā yalidū illā fājiran kaffārā

ayas.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
ayas.translation: "O my Lord! Forgive me, my parents, all who enter my house in Faith, and (all) believing men and believing women: and to the wrong-doers grant Thou no increase but in perdition!"
ayas.transliteration: rabbigh-fir lī waliwālidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu-minan walil-mu-minīna wal mu-mināti walā tazidiẓ ẓālimīna illā tabārā
